mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title:
Nurturing the Infinite Garden
in Korea.
mission.description: The Ticker is ETH is a non-profit organization inspired by the Ethereum Foundation's philosophy, nurturing the growth of Korea's Ethereum ecosystem with a gardener's heart.
mission.subtraction: Rather than monopolizing power, we distribute it to the ecosystem, creating an environment where the community can thrive on its own.
mission.publicGoods: Operated purely through grants and donations. We exist solely for the value of public goods.
mission.infiniteGarden: With a gardener's heart, we tend to and nurture the infinite garden of Korea's Ethereum ecosystem.

cta.title: Join the Collective.
cta.description: Whether you're a researcher, developer, or storyteller, help us build the definitive Ethereum resource for Korea.
